commits.message:
EUCA-12800 - CLC returns bad DNS response to instance only when TTL has expired

Description:
 - If a DNS request comes in at the exact time that an entry expires (TTL == 0) then the response will be malformed and not contain an answer section
 - Problem remains with CNAMES, but that will require more work as Lookup.run() doesn't give us the complete CNAME record, yet expires the entry from the cache.

Changes:
 - Bypass asking for entries from the xbill DNS cache given that we already have them

Testing:
 - Tested customer reported use case, verified that responses are now correct
 - QA concise regression tests
